diagrams.description: Digital Marketing encompasses diverse channels, techniques, and technologies for online customer engagement. Search engine optimization improves organic visibility through keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO, and link building. Social media marketing builds communities on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and TikTok through content sharing and engagement. Content marketing delivers value through blogs, videos, podcasts, infographics, and ebooks that educate and entertain. Pay-per-click advertising targets audiences via Google Ads, social ads, display networks, and retargeting campaigns. Email marketing nurtures relationships through segmented campaigns, automation workflows, and personalized messaging. Influencer marketing leverages creators and brand ambassadors for authentic promotion. Marketing automation streamlines lead nurturing, customer journeys, and campaign management. Analytics and attribution track customer journeys, conversion paths, and ROI across touchpoints.
